summary.span: 表示 32 位带符号整数。

span.span: Represents a 32-bit signed integer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是表示一个不可变的值类型的有符号整数的值范围从负的 2,147,483,648 (这由常量) 2,147,483,647 之间 (表示通过常量。 is an immutable value type that represents signed integers with values that range from negative 2,147,483,648 (which is represented by the constant) through positive 2,147,483,647 (which is represented by the constant. .NET Framework 还包括 32 位无符号的整数值类型， ，它表示的范围介于 0 和 4,294,967,295 之间的值。The .NET Framework also includes an unsigned 32-bit integer value type, , which represents values that range from 0 to 4,294,967,295. ## 实例化一个 Int32 值Instantiating an Int32 Value 可以实例化几种方式的值：You can instantiate an value in several ways: - 您可以声明变量并将其分配的范围内的整数值数据类型。You can declare an variable and assign it a literal integer value that is within the range of the data type. 下面的示例声明了两个变量并将其分配这种方式中的值。The following example declares two variables and assigns them values in this way. [!code-csharp[System.Int32.Instantiation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Instantiation/cs/Instantiate1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Int32.Instantiation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Instantiation/vb/Instantiate1.vb#1)] - 您可以将其范围是子集的整数类型的值分配的类型。You can assign the value of an integer type whose range is a subset of the type. 这是不需要强制转换运算符在 C# 或 Visual Basic 中的转换方法的扩大转换。This is a widening conversion that does not require a cast operator in C# or a conversion method in Visual Basic. [!code-csharp[System.Int32.Instantiation#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Instantiation/cs/Instantiate1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Int32.Instantiation#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Instantiation/vb/Instantiate1.vb#4)] - 可以分配的范围超过了数值类型的值的类型。You can assign the value of a numeric type whose range exceeds that of the type. 这是收缩转换，因此它需要在 C# 中的强制转换运算符，并在 Visual Basic 中的转换方法如果`Option Strict`上。This is a narrowing conversion, so it requires a cast operator in C# and a conversion method in Visual Basic if `Option Strict` is on. 如果使用数字值是， ，或包括小数部分，其小数部分处理的值取决于编译器执行转换。If the numeric value is a , , or value that includes a fractional component, the handling of its fractional part depends on the compiler performing the conversion. 下面的示例执行收缩转换，若要将分配到多个数值变量。The following example performs narrowing conversions to assign several numeric values to variables. [!code-csharp[System.Int32.Instantiation#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Instantiation/cs/Instantiate1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Int32.Instantiation#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Instantiation/vb/Instantiate1.vb#2)] - 您可以调用的方法类来转换任何受支持的类型为值。You can call a method of the class to convert any supported type to an value. 这可能是因为支持接口。This is possible because supports the interface. 下面的示例演示转换的数组值到值。The following example illustrates the conversion of an array of values to values. [!code-csharp[System.Convert.ToInt32#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.toint32/cs/toint32_1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Convert.ToInt32#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.convert.toint32/vb/toint32_1.vb#4)] - 您可以调用或方法将转换的字符串表示形式值设为。You can call the or method to convert the string representation of an value to an . 该字符串可包含十进制或十六进制数字。The string can contain either decimal or hexadecimal digits. 下面的示例说明了通过使用十进制和十六进制字符串的分析操作。The following example illustrates the parse operation by using both a decimal and a hexadecimal string. [!code-csharp[System.Int32.Instantiation#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Instantiation/cs/Instantiate1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Int32.Instantiation#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Instantiation/vb/Instantiate1.vb#3)] ## 对 Int32 值执行操作Performing Operations on Int32 Values 类型支持标准的数学运算，例如加法、 减法、 除法、 乘法、 求反和一元求反。The type supports standard mathematical operations such as addition, subtraction, division, multiplication, negation, and unary negation. 与其他整数类型，类似类型还支持按位`AND`， `OR`， `XOR`，左移位和右移位运算符。Like the other integral types, the type also supports the bitwise `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, left shift, and right shift operators. 可以使用标准数字运算符比较两个值，也可以调用或方法。You can use the standard numeric operators to compare two values, or you can call the or method. 您还可以调用的成员类来执行各种数值操作，包括获得某个数字的商和整数除法运算的余数计算确定两个最大或最小值的绝对值整数，获取数字的符号和舍入数字。You can also call the members of the class to perform a wide range of numeric operations, including getting the absolute value of a number, calculating the quotient and remainder from integral division, determining the maximum or minimum value of two integers, getting the sign of a number, and rounding a number. ## 作为一个字符串，表示为 int32 类型Representing an Int32 as a String 类型提供对标准和自定义数字格式字符串的完全支持。The type provides full support for standard and custom numeric format strings. (有关详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)，[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)，并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。)(For more information, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md), [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md), and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md).) 若要设置格式值作为不带前导零的整数字符串，可以调用无参数方法。To format an value as an integral string with no leading zeros, you can call the parameterless method. 通过使用"D"格式说明符，还可以包含指定的数目的字符串表示形式中的前导零。By using the "D" format specifier, you can also include a specified number of leading zeros in the string representation. 通过使用"N"格式说明符，可以包含组分隔符和指定的十进制位数出现在数字的字符串表示形式。By using the "N" format specifier, you can include group separators and specify the number of decimal digits to appear in the string representation of the number. 通过使用"X"格式说明符，可以表示值作为十六进制字符串。By using the "X" format specifier, you can represent an value as a hexadecimal string. 下面的示例中的数组元素进行格式设置以下四种方式中的值。The following example formats the elements in an array of values in these four ways. [!code-csharp[System.Int32.Formatting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Formatting/cs/Formatting1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Int32.Formatting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Formatting/vb/Formatting1.vb#1)] 此外可以设置格式通过调用十进制或十六进制字符串值作为二进制、 八进制方法，并提供方法的第二个参数的基。You can also format an value as a binary, octal, decimal, or hexadecimal string by calling the method and supplying the base as the method's second parameter. 下面的示例调用此方法来显示二进制、 八进制和十六进制形式表示的整数值的数组。The following example calls this method to display the binary, octal, and hexadecimal representations of an array of integer values. [!code-csharp[System.Int32.Formatting#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Formatting/cs/Formatting1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Int32.Formatting#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.Formatting/vb/Formatting1.vb#2)] ## 处理非十进制 32 位整数值Working with Non-Decimal 32-Bit Integer Values 除了使用单个整数作为十进制值时，你可能想要执行按位运算的整数值，或使用整数值的二进制或十六进制表示形式。In addition to working with individual integers as decimal values, you may want to perform bitwise operations with integer values, or work with the binary or hexadecimal representations of integer values. 值以 31 位，计时的三十秒位用作符号位为单位表示。 values are represented in 31 bits, with the thirty-second bit used as a sign bit. 使用符号数值表示法来表示正值。Positive values are represented by using sign-and-magnitude representation. 负值是以 2 的补数表示。Negative values are in two's complement representation. 这一点上执行按位运算时，需要注意值或使用的单个位。This is important to keep in mind when you perform bitwise operations on values or when you work with individual bits. 若要执行数字、 布尔值或对任何两个非十进制值的比较运算，这两个值都必须使用相同的表示形式。In order to perform a numeric, Boolean, or comparison operation on any two non-decimal values, both values must use the same representation.

span.span: All members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 看起来要修改实例状态的成员实际上返回使用新值进行初始化的新实例。

span.span: Members that appear to modify instance state actually return a new instance initialized with the new value.

threadsafe.span: 作为使用任何其他类型，读取和写入对共享变量包含此类型的实例必须受到使用锁来确保线程安全性。

span.span: As with any other type, reading and writing to a shared variable that contains an instance of this type must be protected by a lock to guarantee thread safety.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法实现接口，并且执行略微优于方法因为它不具有要转换`value`参数的对象。This method implements the interface and performs slightly better than the method because it does not have to convert the `value` parameter to an object. 具体取决于您的编程语言，有可能对代码方法的参数类型包含的位数少于 （是更窄） 比实例类型。Depending on your programming language, it might be possible to code a method where the parameter type has fewer bits (is narrower) than the instance type. 这可能是因为某些编程语言执行表示具有任意数量的位的实例作为类型参数的隐式扩大转换。This is possible because some programming languages perform an implicit widening conversion that represents the parameter as a type with as many bits as the instance. 例如，假设实例类型是且参数类型为。For example, suppose the instance type is and the parameter type is . Microsoft C# 编译器将生成表示形式的参数值的说明，然后生成比较的值的方法实例和参数表示形式。The Microsoft C# compiler generates instructions to represent the value of the parameter as an , then generates a method that compares the values of the instance and the parameter representation. 请查阅您的编程语言的文档以确定其编译器是否对数值类型执行隐式扩大转换。Consult your programming language's documentation to determine whether its compiler performs implicit widening conversions on numeric types. ## Examples 下面的示例演示方法。The following example demonstrates the method. 除了显示四个不同的比较方法返回的值，它将返回值转换为的自定义成员`Comparison`枚举，它还会显示其值。In addition to displaying the value returned by the method for four different comparisons, it converts the return value to a member of the custom `Comparison` enumeration, whose value it also displays. [!code-csharp[System.Int32.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.CompareTo/cs/CompareTo1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Int32.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.CompareTo/vb/CompareTo1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `s`参数包含多个窗体：The `s` parameter contains a number of the form: [ws][登录] 数字 [ws][ws][sign]digits[ws] 在方括号 （[和]） 是可选的项。Items in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 下表对每个元素进行了描述。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |wsws|可选的空白区域。Optional white space.| |Signsign|一个可选符号后。An optional sign.| |数字digits|范围从 0 到 9 的数字的序列。A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.| `s`参数被解释使用样式。The `s` parameter is interpreted using the style. 除了十进制数，允许仅前导空格和尾随空格以及前导符号。In addition to decimal digits, only leading and trailing spaces together with a leading sign are allowed. 若要显式定义的样式元素可出现在`s`，可以使用两种或方法。To explicitly define the style elements that can be present in `s`, use either the or the method. `s`使用中的格式设置信息分析参数对象初始化为当前系统区域性。The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a object initialized for the current system culture. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 若要分析使用的格式信息的一些其他区域性的字符串，请使用方法。To parse a string using the formatting information of some other culture, use the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将字符串值转换为 32 位有符号的整数值，并使用方法。The following example demonstrates how to convert a string value into a 32-bit signed integer value using the method. 然后向控制台显示生成的整数值。The resulting integer value is then displayed to the console. *fractional_digits**fractional_digits*

*exponential_digits**exponential_digits*|从 0 到 9 的数字的序列。A sequence of digits from 0 through 9. 有关*fractional_digits*、 仅数字 0 是有效。For *fractional_digits*, only the digit 0 is valid.| |*，**,*|特定于区域性的千位分隔符号。A culture-specific thousands separator symbol. 当前区域性的千位分隔符可以出现在`s`如果`style`包括标志。The current culture's thousands separator can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag.| |*.**.*|特定于区域性的小数点符号。A culture-specific decimal point symbol. 当前区域性的小数点符号可以出现在`s`如果`style`包括标志。The current culture's decimal point symbol can appear in `s` if `style` includes the flag. 数字 0 |*e**e*|E 或者 E 字符，它指示指数记数法中表示值。The 'e' or 'E' character, which indicates that the value is represented in exponential notation. `s`参数可以表示指数表示法的数字，如果`style`包括标志。The `s` parameter can represent a number in exponential notation if `style` includes the flag.| |*hexdigits**hexdigits*|一系列十六进制数字从 0 到 f 或从 0 到 f。A sequence of hexadecimal digits from 0 through f, or 0 through F.| > [!NOTE] > 中的任何终止 NUL (U + 0000) 字符`s`在分析操作，而不考虑的值，将忽略`style`参数。Any terminating NUL (U+0000) characters in `s` are ignored by the parsing operation, regardless of the value of the `style` argument. 仅为数字的字符串 (对应于样式) 总是可以分析成功。A remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载方法通常用于将可以各种方式格式化文本转换值。This overload of the method is typically used to convert text that can be formatted in a variety of ways to an value. 例如，它可以用于将输入到 HTML 文本中用户的数字值的文本转换。For example, it can be used to convert the text entered by a user into an HTML text box to a numeric value. `s`参数包含多个窗体：The `s` parameter contains a number of the form: [ws][登录] 数字 [ws][ws][sign]digits[ws] 在方括号 （[和]） 是可选的项。Items in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 下表对每个元素进行了描述。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|可选的空白区域。Optional white space.| |*sign**sign*|一个可选符号后。An optional sign.| |*digits**digits*|范围从 0 到 9 的数字的序列。A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.| `s`参数被解释使用样式。The `s` parameter is interpreted using the style. 除了十进制数，允许仅前导空格和尾随空格以及前导符号。In addition to decimal digits, only leading and trailing spaces together with a leading sign are allowed. 若要显式定义的样式元素可出现在`s`，使用方法。To explicitly define the style elements that can be present in `s`, use the method. `provider`参数是实现，如或对象。The `provider` parameter is an implementation, such as a or object. `provider`参数提供区域性特定信息的格式的`s`。The `provider` parameter supplies culture-specific information about the format of `s`. 如果`provider`是`null`，则对象使用当前区域性。If `provider` is `null`, the object for the current culture is used. ## Examples 下面的示例是按钮单击事件处理程序的 Web 窗体。The following example is the button click event handler of a Web form. 它使用返回的数组属性来确定用户的区域设置。It uses the array returned by the property to determine the user's locale. 它然后实例化对应于该区域设置的对象。It then instantiates a object that corresponds to that locale. 所属的对象的对象然后传递给方法将用户输入转换为值。The object that belongs to that object is then passed to the method to convert the user's input to an value. 如果`s`表示一个指数表示法数字时，它必须表示一个整数的范围内不带小数部分非零值的数据类型。If `s` represents a number in exponential notation, it must represent an integer within the range of the data type without a non-zero, fractional component.| ||*Ws*开头的元素`s`。The *ws* element at the beginning of `s`.| ||*Ws*结尾的元素`s`。The *ws* element at the end of `s`.| ||可以在其之前显示正号*位数*。A positive sign can appear before *digits*.| ||之后可以显示正号*位数*。A positive sign can appear after *digits*.| ||*登录*形式的括号内包含的数字值的元素。The *sign* element in the form of parentheses enclosing the numeric value.| ||千位分隔符 ( *，* ) 元素。The thousands separator ( *,* ) element.| ||*$* 元素。The *$* element.| 如果使用标志，`s`必须是不带前缀的十六进制值。If the flag is used, `s` must be a hexadecimal value without a prefix. 例如，"C9AF3"分析成功，但是"0xC9AF3"却没有。For example, "C9AF3" parses successfully, but "0xC9AF3" does not. 其他标志只有可出现在`style`都和。The only other flags that can be present in `style` are and . (枚举具有复合数字样式，其中包含这两个空白标志。)(The enumeration has a composite number style, , that includes both white space flags.) `provider`参数是实现，如或对象。The `provider` parameter is an implementation, such as a or object. `provider`参数提供在分析中使用的区域性特定信息。The `provider` parameter supplies culture-specific information used in parsing. 如果`provider`是`null`，则对象使用当前区域性。If `provider` is `null`, the object for the current culture is used. ## Examples 下面的示例使用的各种`style`并`provider`参数来分析的字符串表示形式值。The following example uses a variety of `style` and `provider` parameters to parse the string representations of values. 它还演示了一些相同的字符串可以解释具体取决于其格式设置信息用于在分析操作的区域性的不同方法。It also illustrates some of the different ways the same string can be interpreted depending on the culture whose formatting information is used for the parsing operation. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法格式默认值 （"G"或常规） 中的值使用的格式当前区域性的对象。The method formats an value in the default ("G", or general) format by using the object of the current culture. 如果你想要指定不同的格式或区域性，使用的其他重载方法，按如下所示：If you want to specify a different format or culture, use the other overloads of the method, as follows: |若要使用格式To use format|区域性For culture|使用重载Use the overload| |-------------------|-----------------|----------------------| |默认值 ("G") 格式Default ("G") format|特定区域性A specific culture|| |特定的格式A specific format|默认值 （当前） 区域性Default (current) culture|| |特定的格式A specific format|特定区域性A specific culture|| .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，其格式设置的以下主题中更详细地介绍：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的示例显示值使用默认方法。The following example displays an value using the default method. 它还显示的字符串表示形式使用多个标准格式说明符而得出的值。It also displays the string representations of the value that results from using a number of standard format specifiers. 这些示例使用 EN-US 区域性的格式设置约定来显示。The examples are displayed using the formatting conventions of the en-US culture. [!code-cpp[System.Int32.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.ToString/cpp/ToString1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Int32.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.ToString/cs/ToString.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Int32.ToString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.ToString/vb/ToString.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法格式默认值 （"G"或常规） 中的值使用的格式指定区域性的对象。The method formats an value in the default ("G", or general) format by using the object of a specified culture. 如果你想要指定不同的格式或当前区域性，使用的其他重载方法，按如下所示：If you want to specify a different format or the current culture, use the other overloads of the method, as follows: |若要使用格式To use format|区域性For culture|使用重载Use the overload| |-------------------|-----------------|----------------------| |默认值 ("G") 格式Default ("G") format|默认值 （当前） 区域性Default (current) culture|| |特定的格式A specific format|默认值 （当前） 区域性Default (current) culture|| |特定的格式A specific format|特定区域性A specific culture|| `provider`参数是一个对象，实现接口。The `provider` parameter is an object that implements the interface. 其方法将返回提供此方法返回的字符串格式的区域性特定信息的对象。Its method returns a object that provides culture-specific information about the format of the string that is returned by this method. 实现的对象可以是任何以下：The object that implements can be any of the following: - 一个对象，表示要使用其格式设置规则的区域性。A object that represents the culture whose formatting rules are to be used. - 一个对象，其中包含此值的特定数值格式设置信息。A object that contains specific numeric formatting information for this value. - 实现一个自定义对象并且其方法将返回提供格式设置信息的对象。A custom object that implements and whose method returns a object that provides formatting information. 如果`provider`是`null`或不能从获取对象`provider`，返回值进行格式设置使用线程的当前区域性的对象。If `provider` is `null` or a object cannot be obtained from `provider`, the return value is formatted using the object for the thread current culture. 有关当前区域性的信息，请参阅。For information about the thread current culture, see . .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，其格式设置的以下主题中更详细地介绍：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). ## Examples 下面的示例显示的字符串表示形式值使用代表多个不同区域的对象。The following example displays the string representation of an value using objects that represent several different cultures. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法格式通过使用指定的格式值对象，表示当前区域性的约定。The method formats an value in a specified format by using a object that represents the conventions of the current culture. 如果想要使用默认值 （"G"或常规） 格式或指定不同的区域性，请使用的其他重载方法，按如下所示：If you want to use the default ("G", or general) format or specify a different culture, use the other overloads of the method, as follows: |若要使用格式To use format|区域性For culture|使用重载Use the overload| |-------------------|-----------------|----------------------| |默认值 ("G") 格式Default ("G") format|默认值 （当前） 区域性Default (current) culture|| |默认值 ("G") 格式Default ("G") format|特定区域性A specific culture|| |特定的格式A specific format|特定区域性A specific culture|| `format`参数可以是"R"之外的任何有效的标准数字格式说明符以及任何自定义数字格式说明符的组合。The `format` parameter can be any valid standard numeric format specifier except for "R", as well as any combination of custom numeric format specifiers. 如果`format`是`null`或空字符串 ("")，此实例的返回值格式与常规的数字格式说明符 ("G")。If `format` is `null` or an empty string (""), the return value of this instance is formatted with the general numeric format specifier ("G"). .NET Framework 提供了广泛的格式设置支持，其格式设置的以下主题中更详细地介绍：The .NET Framework provides extensive formatting support, which is described in greater detail in the following formatting topics: - 有关数字格式说明符的详细信息，请参阅[标准数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md)并[自定义数字格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md)。For more information about numeric format specifiers, see [Standard Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-numeric-format-strings.md) and [Custom Numeric Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-numeric-format-strings.md). - 有关格式设置的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about formatting, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 此实例返回值进行格式设置为当前区域性。The return value of this instance is formatted with the for the current culture. ## Examples 下面的示例显示值使用每个受支持的标准数字格式说明符，以及两个自定义数字格式字符串。The following example displays an value using each of the supported standard numeric format specifiers, together with two custom numeric format strings. 在将该数字值转换为字符串，该示例使用 EN-US 区域性的格式设置约定。In converting the numeric values to strings, the example uses the formatting conventions of the en-US culture. 一个对象，表示要使用其格式设置规则的区域性。A object that represents the culture whose formatting rules are to be used. - 一个对象，其中包含此值的特定数值格式设置信息。A object that contains specific numeric formatting information for this value. - remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法就像方法中，除方法不会引发异常，如果转换失败。The method is like the method, except the method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 它消除了需要使用异常处理来测试的事件中`s`无效，不能成功分析。It eliminates the need to use exception handling to test for a in the event that `s` is invalid and cannot be successfully parsed. `s`参数包含多个窗体：The `s` parameter contains a number of the form: [ws][登录] 数字 [ws][ws][sign]digits[ws] 在方括号 （[和]） 是可选的项。Items in square brackets ([ and ]) are optional. 下表对每个元素进行了描述。The following table describes each element. |元素Element|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |*ws**ws*|可选的空白区域。Optional white space.| |*sign**sign*|一个可选符号后。An optional sign.| |*digits**digits*|范围从 0 到 9 的数字的序列。A sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.| `s`参数被解释使用样式。The `s` parameter is interpreted using the style. 除了十进制数字，允许仅前导空格和尾随空格以及前导符号。In addition to the decimal digits, only leading and trailing spaces together with a leading sign are allowed. 若要显式定义的样式元素以及可出现在特定于区域性的格式设置信息`s`，使用方法。To explicitly define the style elements together with the culture-specific formatting information that can be present in `s`, use the method. `s`使用中的格式设置信息分析参数对象初始化为当前系统区域性。The `s` parameter is parsed using the formatting information in a object initialized for the current system culture. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 此重载方法中的所有数字都解释`s`为十进制数字的参数。This overload of the method interprets all digits in the `s` parameter as decimal digits. 若要分析的十六进制数字的字符串表示形式，请调用重载。To parse the string representation of a hexadecimal number, call the overload. ## Examples 下面的示例调用使用大量不同的字符串值的方法。The following example calls the method with a number of different string values. [!code-cpp[System.Int32.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.TryParse/cpp/int32.tryparse1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Int32.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.TryParse/cs/TryParse1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Int32.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Int32.TryParse/vb/TryParse1.vb#1)] 一些字符串，方法不能进行转换在此示例是：Some of the strings that the method is unable to convert in this example are: - "9432.0"."9432.0". 转换失败，因为该字符串不能包含十进制分隔符，则它必须包含仅整数位。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain a decimal separator; it must contain integral digits only. - "16,667"."16,667". 转换失败，因为该字符串不能包含组分隔符，则为它必须包含仅整数位。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain group separators; it must contain integral digits only. - "(100)"."(100)". 转换失败，因为该字符串不能包含不是由当前区域性定义负号和属性。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain a negative sign other than the one defined by the current culture's and properties. - "01FA"。"01FA". 转换失败，因为该字符串不能包含十六进制数字;它必须包含仅为十进制数字。The conversion fails because the string cannot contain hexadecimal digits; it must contain decimal digits only.
